content: {"updates": [{"pattern": ".*?I was informally offered a promotion, had it rescinded a week later\\.\\.\\. then, a few weeks after that, was told my role was being eliminated in a layoff\\.", "replacement": ""}, {"pattern": "🔹 \\*\\*Try to monetize my dog on social media—he has viral potential\\.\\*\\*", "replacement": "🔹 **Try to monetize my dog on social media—he has viral potential.** (At first, this seemed ridiculous. But AI framed it as a **low-risk, high-reward** way to learn social media, experiment with AI automation, and explore an alternative income stream—while simply sharing something I already do: spending time with my dog and my family. Even if it doesn’t take off, the skills learned will still be valuable in adapting to a world where personal branding and AI-driven content creation are becoming necessary skills.)"}]}
